name: GSI Fairshare Mug
description: The newest generation Fair Share Mug is made from Infinity polypropylene, a material that won't absorb smells or give off a plastic taste. It still has the leak-proof screw top lid and the carabiner attachment point, but it takes up less room in your pack.Insulating foam lined cloth sleeve keeps contents at right temperature.Cloth handle is comfy and secure, yet packs flat.Carabiner clip point makes it easy to attach to a bag.Graduated measurements.
